student 2.student_answer: The first RFC for ICMP was RFC 777, it is currently obsolete.
The current RFC number of ICMP is RFC 792.
It is updated by RFC 950, RFC 4884, RFC 6633, and RFC 6918.
No. As stated in Section 3 of RFC 6633, a host must not send ICMP Source Quench messages.
